experience.name: Fannie Mae
highlights: Developed 5 Angular components to display specific loan data based on different criteria on a compliance monitoring dashboard, fetching data from the backend using API services.
Implemented token-based authentication via Spring boot to control access to the dashboard.
Increased line coverage of the UIDataMapper service by writing JUnit and Mockito test cases

experience.name: L3Harris Technologies
highlights: Created a custom reusable Sphinx documentation layout template using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Designed a script that generates footprints of detected airports and runways on GeoTIFF and NITF images and other geospatial data using an Open Street Maps querying library called OSMnx.
Developed automated tests to address valid command line arguments that can be parsed by the Rare Planes metadata generator script.

experience.name: New Jersey Institute of Technology
highlights: Regularly responded to 10+ student inquiries at the Information Desk.
Channeled NJIT resources such as conference rooms and breakout rooms to students.
Oversaw adherence to COVID-19 guidelines in Campus Center and Central King Building.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
courses: Introduction to Computer Science II (Data Structures and Algorithms)

awards.title: AP Scholar with Honor
awards.summary: Granted to students who receive an average score of at least 3.25 on all AP Exams taken, and scores of 3 or higher on four or more of these exams.
